website_summaries.verdict: An expandable bag that can give you a lot more space when you need it.
pros: Polycarbonate sides are very strong and resist scratches
Luggage holds up well through heavy travel
Hard exterior protects your personal items
Model comes in several sizes and colors
cons: If this bag gets accidentally expanded while in transit you might find your personal items unorganized

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable, Warranty is a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I've had this carry-on for less than a year and the shell has already cracked. I reached out to Victorinox regarding the issue and their warranty requires sending the item in for repair to MO ($50 shipping) and providing a credit card so they can charge for the repair if they deem it's not covered under warranty. Futhermore, there's some additional "processing" fees involved. This is the last time I'll purchase anything from this company. The carry-on is NOT well made and overpriced. The "warranty" is a joke. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased 4 pieces of this luggage. A ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 pieces of this luggage. A huge crack developed overnight in the 29" model. It was not from abuse or the airlines. I carried to my condo in Crested Butte where it remained for 5 days in conditioned space. I picked it up and carried it to the car for a trip home. When I reached the airport in Gunnison there was this huge crack in one corner. All the protocol was followed with the standard response this was "normal wear and tear and not covered by warranty", which is bunk. These folks are not honest and do not stand behind their product. Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Just meh..
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay suitcase but I'm not in love with it. The mesh inset is structured weirdly and makes packing this suitcase more of a pain in the neck than it needs to be. Thank goodness I also ordered packing cubes with this suitcase which is the only thing that really makes it tolerable. It IS a great roller and even though the casing itself is flexible, it is REALLY strong. It's definitely a sturdy suitcase and having four rollers is fantastic. It's functionality for packing leaves a lot to be desired, though. Seriously; get packing cubes to go with this case and you'll be a lot happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marla H.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage to travel for work. For a solid month and a half I travelled every week. After that I travelled every other week and I must say this luggage has held up wonderfully. Although there are definitely some scratches and scrapes I haven't had any major issues and we all know how careless airline personnel are with traveler's luggage. I will definitely look to purchase the matching carry on piece if I can find it for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Because it opens on top, it takes up less room in a hotel room and you can actually use a luggage rack while you unpack. Suitcases that open into halves, have to be opened and put on the floor or the bed. It rolls very easily no matter how heavily I have packed it. I do a lot of international travel so appreciate and use the locking device.
customer_reviews.author: B.James

customer_reviews.title: by cheep and replace when needed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this victorinox spectra 2.0 27 inch in 2018. On my last flight the suitcase was severely damage. The airline refuesed to replace or repair so I emailed Victorinox Service they gave me a repair number and adderss to ship the unit back. There is a $50.00 in house transaction fee plus my cost for shipping the total of $278.00 for a suit case I paid on sale for $280.00 The suit case needs to be replaced the wheel on one side is broken off the case is cracked on one side and the other side was bad lee dented So my opinion the warranty is worthless SO by cheep and replace when needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item. It's lightweight and has ample storage for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item. It's lightweight and has ample storage for 2-3 day leisure trip or even 3-5 day business trip if you don't pack alot of heavy garments and shoes. The added laptop pouch is a good way for those of us with two or three laptops to avoid an additional carry-on or risk back damage carrying three laptops in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Scalio

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: You could buy a cheaper suitcase, ... Then when that one busts a zipper or cracks a corner, you could buy another one and then when that one fails as well, you could buy another, ... Or, ... you could just bite the bullet and buy this durable, well built, feather-light and capacious valise and get on with dealing with all the other myriad of things that your life has you chasing after, ... These suitcases by Victorinox, in my experience, take a beating and keep on & on, trip after trip, year after year, ...Just get on with it - You won't regret it, ... You buy cheap, you buy twice, ...
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying this kind of Victorinox luggage
customer_reviews.text: I travel full time for a living and have destroyed many pieces of luggage over the past 23 years on the road. Most luggage lasts about 3 years of full time weekly travel. This wasn't even subject to full time travel and the zippers stripped out in less than a year. I do not recommend buying this kind of Victorinox luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the style
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, size and wheels but it's not easy to get into the case or use it easily. The door/lid that allows you easy access isn't easy and it doesn't hold very much. It's awkward....you can't put much in the door/lid. When it's lying down, the lid/door stuff spills out, when it's upright, something is off balance and you can't access the interior of the case which is quite small when you zip in the net that holds things in place.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Azuma

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this bag! Another plus is the ease of pushing/pulling this bag wherever I need to go. It is very easy to steer it in the desired direction. I have had decent quality bags that do not compare in this respect. I will never switch back. There is nothing worse th an fighting with your bag when traveling. The combination lock system is easy to set up and use. I am a happy traveler these days.
customer_reviews.author: misshesitation

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase . I bought a medium one initially and tried it out. This luggage can really fit a lot when expand. The wheels are good and it can sin round 360 degree and is smooth. I decided to buy a large one this time and as usually, it was such a good buy and use. Highly recommended. The large size is best for winter use as we can fit thicker clothes without the hassle of having another bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shell suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a plastic shell. It's a great size for a 1-2 week trip. Love the red color. Easy to spot coming out of the baggage carousel. It's a bit expensive for what it is, so not a great value. Still, I've enjoyed using it (over the last 3+ years) and have been happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ocellaris7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Product for Carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This suitcase is designed to be a carry-on for ANY commercial aircraft. I travel significantly, and have found it does indeed fit in virtually all aircraft . . including the tiny overhead compartments on the CRJ type jets. Very lightweight, and easy to roll through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very weak wheels and corners - do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Under normal conditions, with only about 40lbs inside, one of the corner wheels just collapsed inside. Took it to Airline - they said it was bad product. Took it to authorized shop - they said it was airline damage. So I am out $250 and had to drag a non-working, large suitcase back home.
customer_reviews.author: Les J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits European guidelines for cary-on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Victorinox carry-on bags for my husband and myself for a month long trip to various countries in Europe. They are super easy to manage in the airport and walking outside. They are the correct carry-on size for European flights. Amazon had a deal on black bags so I bought 2 and added different colored handle covers to distinguish "mine" and "his". They are easy to open, close and lock and super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn F.

customer_reviews.title: Best carry on - UNDER RATED
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I'm a Frecuent Flyer These is my second Victorinox Spectra CarryOn My first one is 2 years old and still in great condition I buy this for my wife
customer_reviews.author: ㅅㅅ

customer_reviews.title: Most rugged luggage ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best luggage ever. I travel for a living and have the carry on version as well. The carry on version has over 200,000 miles of travel and still works perfectly. I bought this larger one for longer trips. Love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the business traveler
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels constantly for business, and a wheel broke off of his previous suitcase. After reading the reviews on this one, I decided to give the harder-sided case a try. He loves it! This case is extraordinarily easy to maneuver through airports and fits into the overhead easily, even though he thought it looked too big at first. It also holds a lot more than you would think at first glance, and he can travel for five days without having to stuff things into it. All in all, a great purchase so far. Hopefully it will be as durable as I've heard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Roller and Top Notch Customer Support!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and 10 year warranty! Very lightweight and super happy with it. Had one issue after a month of use; one side of a double wheel fell off sometime while I was rolling it, and didn't notice until I got back to the house. Called 888-658-0717 and talked to Barb, who was super nice and got me out a replacement wheel with no issue. Highly recommend. Plus with red, you don't have to inspect every black samsonite bag that comes out of the luggage area at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Matthes

customer_reviews.title: Lacks split opening making it hard to load and use. Sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase only loads from the front, so you can't lay it down to use on a trip. I have another Victorinox that splits in half; this doesn't, making it a pain to pack and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for an upcoming trip to Mexico. As far as I can tell, they are very sturdy while being light weight. I registered with Victorinox for the guarantee and the tracking service should they be lost. They packed well, kept all items in place during the trip (including some fragile items), and survived four flights a bit banged up but entirely intact. My wife and I are very pleased with this luggage, and it's easy to spot these orangey cases on airline conveyor belts!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence from OIB NC

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Late to write this, but ive had this case for a year now, travelling allover the world, and it's solid, light, and secure for my belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: the strap to adjust the expansion is useless and it keeps becoming loose in a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as it was expandable. However; the strap to adjust the expansion is useless and it keeps becoming loose in a couple of minutes after tightening making the whole suitcase unstable. check the video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: we Purchased our second suitcase, loved the look and the way it rolls,we do a lot of long international travel and we looked for some time for the right suitcase , unfortunately one was damaged and the casing was cracked in several areas and couldn't be repaired last year (we thought that the airline used exceptional force or just an accident, however the same thing now happened to the second suitcase! not sure what composite of carbon fiber is used by the manufacturer but it's very disappointing as we thought this was the best suitcase for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece of luggage. Initially, I was afraid to use the expanded sections because it not made of the hard shell material. But after buying way to many souvenirs on a trip, I had no choice-lol. No need to worry, my luggage survived the trip with not damage either to my luggage or the items inside.
customer_reviews.author: La-Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but not as big as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece of luggage, but you need to pay attention to the measurements. Not full-sized, but almost. It is fully as deep as full-sized suitcases. Very light weight for its size. The security lock works very well. After three trips on the airlines, no problems to report.
customer_reviews.author: California Doug

customer_reviews.title: Product came with no how-to for lock - and it's locked!
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this suitcase! There's no instruction on the lock, it arrived locked, and I can't inspect the inside! I will return in a few days if I can't get lock information.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched, super thin & flexible, unsure how it would hold up
customer_reviews.text: arrived with multiple scratches in the plastic & is very thin flexible plastic. super light, which is great, but like the prior reviewer, i'm very concerned too about how this will hold up with actual travel given how bad it looks "brand new". requesting a return but waiting to hear back from seller. was so excited about this bag based on reviews under another seller but really having doubts now.
customer_reviews.author: abee

customer_reviews.title: Suitcase arrived locked
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase arrived locked. Code 000 will not open, please advise how to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Brender

customer_reviews.title: Great large suitcase with lots of convenient storage areas.
customer_reviews.text: Great large suitcase with lots of convenient storage areas. Easy to pack. Hard exterior protects clothes and keeps from wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Hans B.

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: you will never lose sight of the bag again. it's just simple so easy to spot during bagage claim. light weight, flexible. only draw back is, it's gonna get scratch, it's gonna get dirty. but for a traveler like me, a prestine bag meant you haven't travel enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Fit just fine on a Delta flight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fit just fine on a Delta flight. The only caveat is to remember that these wheels are designed to effectively roll, so should you be on some sort of uneven ground or under the influence of some kind of momentum, be it subway or light rail, this unit can get away from you!
customer_reviews.author: Chester Corpt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, light weight and well built carry-on case
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, sturdy, light weight and well built carry-on case. The anti scratch surface exceeds my expectation. There's a newer version of it, with an extra pocket accessible from outside of the case, in my opinion, is totally worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: boss

customer_reviews.title: ... only took 3 trips before it started to crack horribly. Not like my last Swiss Army canvas suitcase ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag only took 3 trips before it started to crack horribly. Not like my last Swiss Army canvas suitcase that lasted me 16 years of traveling 2 to 3 times a month. This product is GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Resonably Priced Hard Sided Cases
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Would like to give it 4.5 stars. The only thing I wish was it had some additional pockets within the case. So far it is a robust, resistant yet good looking case. Packed a week + worth of clothing without any issues. I will easily buy other products from Victorinox.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised - works like a charm. Used it on two short driving trips now; easy to pack; easy to roll; easy to carry. Not yet taken on a plane, but will this Fall. Lock works well also and is fairly flush with suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Victorinox collector when it comes to bags.I bought this for my husband and he is very happy to have this bag.This product is another one I would highly recommend.This is good for a two to three day trip.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice, competitive price, medium size, expandable luggage. I also bought the smaller one, for carry on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dantes753

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great space. Easy to move. lightweight to lift even when packed.
customer_reviews.author: quiltdolly

customer_reviews.title: this luggage looks good at the time you open
customer_reviews.text: this luggage looks good at the time you open. But after first time used it has scratches all over. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OFFICE USER

customer_reviews.title: Value and size were key drivers in the selection of ...
customer_reviews.text: Value and size were key drivers in the selection of this product. Based on customer reviews, my wife narrowed it down to this large luggage. It's leightweight and durable, which are key elements she was looking for. Plus, it's unique yet not off putting color makes it standout on an airport conveyor belt.
customer_reviews.author: Derek I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Luggage, Looks a little banged up by airport ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Luggage, Looks a little banged up by airport folks, BUT, stands up well. It is so good that I Have a 29" and ordered this to match. Well worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Mike154

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I just came back from a trip. What a light carry on! My mom got me a nice Tumi bag a few years ago as a birthday gift. Beautiful but heavy. It was hard for me to purchase another carry on since my current carry on luaage is in perfect condition. After reading the reviews, I bit the bullet(pun). I am so HAPPY with this bag. It Is spacious and easy to organize your items. I am ready for my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but marks easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suitcase! It moves well and there is no pressure on my back - very easy to maneuver. It's stylish and very light. I would have given it 5 stars except there are new marks every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is not cheap- but it is absolutely beautiful. The 4 wheels glide effortlessly. The structure seems stron although there is bend and give to the side walls. I probably wouldn't check this bag but as a carry on it's excellent
customer_reviews.author: JG1

customer_reviews.title: Luggage Snob
customer_reviews.text: It's been great so far. I should register it so I can make use of the global tracking but haven't yet. It will scratch--that's the only bummer. If you could care less about the brand, skip it.
customer_reviews.author: VogueReview

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Will update as I do more travels
customer_reviews.text: Unusual entry/unzipping. Good size. Will update as I do more travels. Should have 50k miles on it by next year.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Received smaller carry-on as a gift - and purchased the 29 in as a result!
customer_reviews.text: I received the smaller carry-on as a gift - and a very useful one at that! Fell in love with that one and decided to buy this larger one to match. I love the sturdy construction, the scrolling combination lock that locks the zipper pulls in place, and the smooth casters. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: ... bride for their honeymoon to Iceland and it was perfect! Great expandable feature
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my son & his bride for their honeymoon to Iceland and it was perfect! Great expandable feature, tons of space & rotating wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla johnson

customer_reviews.title: The design is perfect for a small hotel room.
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I thought but I love the design for a small hotel room. Not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this Case. I have bought all three sizes. They roll amazing and works perfect when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: GGRAY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this suit case. I have all three sizes they are the best suitcase I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: GGRAY

customer_reviews.title: Reliable three years in!
customer_reviews.text: I travel internationally every week for work and have used this for three years. I would absolutely buy another one - but the first one is still going strong! Never a single issue with zippers or wheels. And despite me putting it through the wringer - still looks amazing. You also don’t see it very often in airports - kind of different.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McLindon

customer_reviews.title: it rolls great, you can fit a great amount of stuff
customer_reviews.text: obsessed with this luggage. it rolls great, you can fit a great amount of stuff. super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good material throughout. The wheels are so smooth it makes pushing this thing along the platform effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Luan Ngo-Tran

customer_reviews.title: Quality matters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and meets the latest size requirements which many others do not. Small difference but could be the difference between pink tag and no pink tag.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart :-(
customer_reviews.text: It lasted two trips and it completely fell apart. I had to buy new luggage at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: El Profe

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and lightweight... Not the best choice for flying considering the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and lightweight... One trip to Europe and it already suffered from scratches and two major dents. I foresee it will not last very long if I keep using it as checked baggage on flights. I was expecting more for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Anansi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. The airline did its worst and came ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. The airline did its worst and came through without a mark on it. I just bought another one on a pre Black Friday close out from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent piece of luggage. It's light weight but very tough. It could be roomier but couldn't every piece of luggage. I'll just have to get the 32 incher. This is a very good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hanel

customer_reviews.title: Solid Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because it was just too small for my needs. I have one that is larger and it is fantastic. Had for over a year and no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Chill2345

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suitcase. Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suitcase. Light and strong. I absolutely stuffed it with heavy items, sat on it to close it, and lugged it on and off pavements (sidewalks), on bumpy tracks, and it handled them like a charm - the zip, wheels and case. A few scuffs from the wall (probably can scratch these off) but other than that, couldn't be better! Integrated TSA lock is a bonus, and don't even think about getting a two wheeler!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Yuta Bann

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my niece. She says ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my niece. She says she loves it!!! So. I hope so. I haven't actually seen it
customer_reviews.author: Polly Talbott

customer_reviews.title: Travel in style
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just camer back from overseas trip; no dents or scratches on exterior. Holds amazing amount of clothing with no wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: P. Lerro

customer_reviews.title: Great for international biz trip
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for international biz trip. Plenty of space when you expanded even if you have souvenirs from your biz partners.
customer_reviews.author: Takashi

customer_reviews.title: Unique color, durable, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase absolutely met my expectations. It felt solid, not flimsy like some others I checked out at Costco. The lining was nice, and the zippered pouch came in handy. The exterior survived multiple international flights with only a few minor scratches and some rubber transfer from conveyer belts that easily came off. The wheels run fine still, after being pulled over all sorts of terrain, including while it was raining. It has a unique color and was always easy to spot at baggage claim. I'd definitely buy it again, but I'm guessing this will last me for a while to come.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the CRJ200 overhead bins
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the CRJ200 overhead bins. No more pink tag valet checked bag. Board the plane with your bag and leave for your next flight without having to stand aside and wait for your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: good design, and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, good design, and looks great. Our new favorite piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Northern VA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nifty suitcase, very clever indeed! Got this as a present for my husband who travels a lot for work and has tried many suitcases. He says this is the best one yet! And believe me, he's tried many.
customer_reviews.author: JenH

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my Europe trip, was very easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeetu

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on and model
customer_reviews.text: Great carry on and model. However, the picture made the color seem much more red and when I received it it is much more pink looking. That was a bit of a deception. Other than that everything else ok!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Victorinox. Top quality. I am a Victorinox fan and the Spectra series doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: MsWms

customer_reviews.title: Light and unexpectedly spacious
customer_reviews.text: Light and unexpectedly spacious, covered a 2 week business trip with no space to spare. Fantastic rollers glide on hard surfaces. Pricy but hope it will be for the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, easy to maneuver, stands out when retrieving it from baggage claim - love it.
customer_reviews.author: FL Esq.

customer_reviews.title: The six wheels are so easy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Used for trip to Europe. Packed for 2 of us for 2 weeks. The six wheels are so easy and smooth. No issues with bag so far
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room, easy to roll. Only con is I wish it had an exterior pouch for easy access to documents/passport.
customer_reviews.author: Debs9505

customer_reviews.title: love it. very light weight and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: love it. very light weight and easy to move. Perfect. Took it to Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Scicolone

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice suitcase, plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice suitcase, plain and simple. Yes, it may scratch. Yes, it is small (but it is the size of the US carry-on requirements). But it is very light and well made. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on
customer_reviews.text: Great carry on bag. I was totally amazed at the amount of stuff I could pack in it.
customer_reviews.author: dairydawg

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but high quality material and construction. The luggage is very lightweight and rolls easily. I would give it a 5 rating if there were a hand-hold on the bottom to make it a bit easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The video clearly shows an outside entry compartment. This ...
customer_reviews.text: The video clearly shows an outside entry compartment. This item does not have that. It is a solid case.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and rolls with the best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! Very lightweight and that has me concerned but we'll see how it works on our first trip coming up next week.
customer_reviews.author: Hush + Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pack.
customer_reviews.text: Does not open in halves so packing is a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcàse!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, flexible so can stuff it full. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cutter66

customer_reviews.title: The Spectra line of suitcases is fantastic. One small concern is that it gets scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: The Spectra line of suitcases is fantastic. One small concern is that it gets scratched easily by handling at airports etc.
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Great construction and I was initially concerned with the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and I was initially concerned with the size but after taking two one week trips and filled it to the brim it was great. Would definitely buy another. This is my 4th piece of luggage I have purchased from Victorinox.
customer_reviews.author: BCTOTH

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my luggage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my luggage. I also have the carry on in white and I get a log if looks when I travel
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best travel gear a business travel can have.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Brender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage. Lots of room. Rolls very well and size fits down the aisle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great durability however slightly pricey. Plenty of room for a week long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, rolls really smoothly, and good looking. Liner is on the cheap side but gets the job done. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: Best suitcase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best suitcase I have ever owned. So easy to pack and unpack.
customer_reviews.author: N. Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Best Suit Case EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is AMAZING!! A+++++ Super great product. This suit case is AMAZING! So happy with my purchase!! I plan to eventually get the larger bag that is made for checking in once I have the need for longer travel.
customer_reviews.author: ABC317

customer_reviews.title: A truly high quality hard side luggage.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. This is the second one I have purchased and they have been absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Scuff Alert!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. First use, before even getting on the plane, bag was scuffed (being removed from taxi trunk). Further scuffing in overhead bins. Would not wash off or clean up. Permanently marked after one use! Not good enough, considering high price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality from Victorinox.
customer_reviews.text: For such a large case, there should be more straps or dividers to help with packing and to keep things from moving about in transit. The locks don't work reliably and it's very scary when you can't open the case. On the good side, it's very lightweight and the 4 wheels make it easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Danny

customer_reviews.title: Roomy without any worries about it being oversize. Lightweight and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size; big enough for lots of storage but we had no worries about it being too big for IcelandAir. It stood up to our week+ trip with no issues. We haven't had it a long time but I'll update the review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily in Boulder

customer_reviews.title: Light weight hard side with easy mobility through busy airports
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and exactly what I wanted. Light weight hard side with easy mobility through busy airports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size. It fits a lot more items than ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size. It fits a lot more items than expected. Went away for a long weekend and fit 5 outfits including shoes and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Victorinox Spectra 2.0 Hardside Spinner Suitcase, Black, Expandable Checked-Large (30")
product_meta.description: Size:Expandable Checked-Large (30")| Color:BlackVICTORINOX SPECTRA 2.0 COLLECTION. When it's time to travel the world, the Spectra Collection is ready. Engineered to be lightweight without sacrificing durability, these cases feature 100% pure Bayer polycarbonate, a stylish, scratch-resistant matte finish and protective corner guards. And with its quick-access door, we made sure, you’re always ready too. Just pick your destination, pack your Spectra and dive right into your next adventure. details. FEATURES Expandable. Increase capacity up to 47% with a 4.3" expander. Easy-Roll. Soft tread offering ideal traction for a smooth roll across any surface while also providing 360 Degree maneuverability. Travel Sentry Approved. Lock allows U.S. TSA screeners to open the lock without destroying it, and relock it after inspection. Durable Materials. Break-resistant 100% pure Bayer polycarbonate with corner guards and zipper bumpers. Comfort Grip. Dual-trolley aluminum handle system locks into three different positions. WARRANTY Year 1: Victorinox Total Protection Program: During the first twelve (12) months of ownership, your product is covered by the Victorinox Total Protection Program. Years 2 to 11: Victorinox Quality Warranty Program: From the beginning of the second until the end of the eleventh year of ownership, your product is covered by the Victorinox Quality Warranty Program.
feature_bullets: EXTRA STORAGE. The only checked luggage you’ll need – this case expands for up to 47% more packing capacity and features exterior compression straps that allow you to customize the case size.

BUILT FOR TRAVEL. This ultra-light, wide-body suitcase gives you on-the-go accessibility to the things you need most while traveling. Constructed with break-resistant 100% pure Bayer polycarbonate with a scratch-resistant matte finish.

SMOOTH TRANSPORT. Dual-caster wheels feature soft tread and offer a smooth roll with 360 degree maneuverability and zero weight-in-hand. Comfort grip, one-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system locks into three different positions
TSA LOCK. For international or domestic travelers, the integrated Travel Sentry Approved lock allows U.S. TSA screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection.
SPECIFICATIONS. Dimensions: 12.6 x 18.9 x 30.7 in. Weight: 11 lb, Capacity: 77 l.
